title: Saudi Arabia Foreign Minister visits island
body_lines: Saudi Arabia Foreign Affairs Minister Sheikh Faisal Bin Farhan Al Saud arrived at the Katunayake International Airport this morning for a one day official visit.
He arrived at the airport at 1.20 am today on a special flight accompanied by 18 senior officials from the Ministry.
Justice Minister Ali Sabri and several other officials from the External Affairs Ministry were present at the Katunayake Airport special guest room to greet them.
The Saudi Foreign Minister and his delegation are scheduled to return this evening by the same special flight. (T.K.G. Kapila)
